channel.title: Computer Science on Cloud Nine
channel.description: Recent content in Computer Science on Cloud Nine

item.title: Emacs With an Interface
item.description: What’s All This About Text Editors? I always used to ask, why do people post about their text-editors? These days I know the reason. Computers are lightening fast, using them isn't. You need to leave what you are doing to turn on another piece of software. You have to search for files. You're constantly having to remember how a process works, or search around the IDE to figure out how to do something again.
